article: with heath ledger and jake gyllenhaal as its stars and ang lee as the director , `` brokeback mountain '' is generating the kind of oscar buzz and media exposure that studios typically expect will translate into strong box office numbers .
abstract: brokeback to test waters in mainstream cinema
